extensionDescription.message: Quickly move messages into other folders using the keyboard

markAsRead.message: Mark messages as read when moving

showFolderPath.message: Show full path of each folder in search box

maxRecentFolders.message: Number of recent folders to show

maxRecentFolders.title.message: Changes the number of recent folders shown when no search text is entered.

useLegacyShortcuts.title.message: Use ⇧M as the shortcut for moving messages

useLegacyShortcutsDone.message: You can now use ⇧M ⇧Y and ⇧G. Change the keys in the extension shortcuts.
